EmailTemplate.name: Labs_Event_VC Panel Event-NY_Q115.Email Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: You are Invited - VC Panel: Myth of the Technical Cofounder
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
We are excited to share with you our exclusive VC panel discussion, the Myth of the Technical Co-founder, coming up on February 12th in NYC, co-sponsored by NY Angels and Pivotal Labs.
Our VC panel will discuss options for startups and when a technical co-founder is required.
Register to Attend Now <http://connect.pivotal.io/VC-Panel-Discussion-NYC.html>
Date: Thursday, February 12, 2015 Time: 7:00 PM to 9:00 PM Location: Pivotal Labs, 625 Avenue of the Americas, Second Floor, New York, NY 10011
Panelists include:
Fran Hauser, Partner at Rothenberg Ventures Fran Hauser is a venture capital investor, digital media veteran, and an advocate for women and kids. She is passionate about connecting people and inspiring change.
Steve Schlafman, Principal at RRE Prior to joining RRE, Steve was a Principal at Lerer Ventures, one of NYC's most active seed funds.
Kate Shillo, Principal at Galvanize Kate Shillo helps manage investments for Galvanize Ventures. Previously she helped build and manage Lerer Ventures as Director of Operations for 4 years - an early stage tech investment firm in NYC with over 190 investments.
Questions? Please contact us via email <mailto:pivotal-operations@pivotal.io> or visit our website <http://www.pivotal.io>.
Thank you, The Pivotal Team
